arStrings.szText: When you Shapeshift into a Werewolf or a Werebear, you gain Wildheart for {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} seconds. Wildheart grants you {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|1%x|]{/c} increased damage every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1|1|"]{/c} seconds, stacking {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} times.
